data.title: Chief Operating Officer at Arizona Christian University

data.text:
TowerHunter is pleased to announce the recent appointment of James Tito as Chief Operating Officer at Arizona Christian University in Glendale, Arizona. James brings to ACU over 20 years of leadership experience across the telehealth, technology, and the nonprofit ministry sectors. His previous roles include successful executive assignments at SmartCounseling Corp, Kenneth Copeland Ministries, and eShare Communications.

In his new role at ACU, James will focus on the day-to-day operations of the university, will oversee business operations, reporting, human resources, finance, enrollment management, campus operations, safety, security, IT, and strategic planning. He will use his unique skillset to develop and maintain strong working relationships with Cabinet and University Leaders and will focus in maintaining the unique vision of Arizona Christian University.

Arizona Christian University is an accredited, private, non-profit, Christian university offering a wide variety of degrees. They remain committed to transforming culture with biblical truth by integrating academics with Spiritual development. ACU is one of the fastest growing Christian colleges in America, having grown 28% in the last two years. It has been recognized by US News & World report as a top-rated university for four straight years, ranking #14 in Regional Colleges West, #1 in Best Undergraduate Teaching, and #9 in Best Value Schools.
